translations: 低劣的；丑的；蹩脚的；脏的

sentences.sentence: A new lycée will open in Kentish Town (near grungy Camden Town) this year.
sentences.translation: 今年肯特城（临近康登镇的穷乡僻野）将设立一个新的高中。

sentences.sentence: His USES of grungy textured backgrounds and typography are unmistakable.
sentences.translation: 他通常使用邋遢风格的纹理背景和清楚无误的版式。

sentences.sentence: The locals are eating lunch in makeshift kitchens down grungy back alleys.
sentences.translation: 沿着脏乱的陋巷，当地居民正在临时搭建的厨房里吃午饭。
